name: Paul Moore
bio: I've been programming in Java and JUnit for almost as long as they've existed. I really appreciate the ability to effortlessly refactor code using these tools.

name: Patrick Trottier
bio: I am studying Computer Science in Canada. My passion for the Web as a platform for everyone and Open Source Software fuel my work on projects like Exercism.

name: Peter Tillemans
bio: I am an electronics engineer and language geek who learned programming on an hp-41 and C-64. Now I do mostly java, javascript, python, rust and haskell. I believe that code should sing its intent so the last row in the hall understands the last syllable.

name: Paulo Rosa
bio: I've been programming in Java since 1998 and teaching since 2012.
